name: a new place: fields of hope
description:
'a new place: fields of hope' is the second instalment in the blockchain film series. following on from ‘chapter of surrender’, this episode observes where the story originates. made up of observational moments, ‘fields of hope’ gives an insight into the world being left behind. though through the end, we start to see the same in new perspectives, making us inquisitive of what is to come next.




//
N.B.
due to filesize limitations, a highly compressed 720p version has had to be minted. if any collectors would like access to a high quality version, please get in touch on twitter - @mkfilm_xyz
